title: I need help with my laptop throttling its performance
body:
I don't really know what to do with this. Some months ago my Alienware M17x R4 started to see random FPS drops from time to time. It happens rather infrequently, usually 1-2 times a day, sometimes not at all. I'll just be playing League or Warframe, and my FPS suddenly goes from 60-80 to like 5-10 for about 20 seconds before going back to normal. Probably not life threatening, but it gives me aneurysms.

I think sometimes it happened I checked my Task Manager and saw my CPU was shooting up to 100% for no reason? I'll have to check again sometime to see if that's the case.

I really got no idea what it is anyways, I'm not that knowledgeable when it comes to this stuff, so any help or advice would be appreciated. I'll be able to check my laptop again when I get home later today.
